aboutUs.Công ty MIKA được thành lập năm 2022. Tr: MIKA company was established in 2023. After 1 year of customer-centric development, we are proud to become a core transportation enterprise that actively contributes to the overall development of the transportation industry in particular and the country's economy in general. Always improving to bring the best quality of service to customers.
aboutUs.Tuân thủ phương châm Chất lượng là danh: Adhering to the motto, MIKA Bus Lines is currently operating more than 60 fixed intercity passenger transport routes stretching from South to North with more than 250 ticket offices and central stations. transportation, more than 2,000 vehicles of all kinds, serving more than 20 million passengers per year.
aboutUs.Cùng việc đầu tư phát triển, mở rộng mạn: Along with investment in development, network expansion, new routes and investment in high-quality vehicles, we also focus on applying advanced technology to business activities.
aboutUs.Song hành cùng sự phát triển của xe khác: Along with the development of MIKA passenger cars, we realize an inevitable need to transport goods with passengers and goods without passengers. Meeting the needs and trust of customers for MIKA, MIKA Express Courier Service Joint Stock Company is in the process of being put into operation in the near future.
aboutUs.Lĩnh vực xe khách là mảnh ghép quan trọn: The passenger car sector is an important piece in the main chain of activities that MIKA company aims to. Investing in new high-quality cars, MIKA buses bring passengers full amenities such as air conditioning, wifi, and a team of professional drivers and staff. MIKA bus is committed to providing customers with a safe and comfortable trip at a reasonable price.
aboutUs.Hội nhập và phát triển, góp phần vào sự: Integration and development, contributing to the prosperity of the country. Human resources are the key factor, the biggest asset of the Company. MIKA focuses on creating a modern, dynamic and friendly working environment and gives career development opportunities to all members.
aboutUs.MIKA phục vụ hơn 20.000.000 triệu hành k: MIKA serves more than 20,000,000 million passengers nationwide each country
aboutUs.Hơn 250 phòng vé, văn phòng đưa đón: More than 250 ticket offices, shuttle offices
